nodes.text: OWO-3 was a battle droid who served as a gunner aboard the Trade Federation flagship, the modified Lucrehulk-class LH-3210 cargo freighter Saak'ak. In the year 32 BBY, shortly before the Invasion of Naboo, Chief Gunner Jull Dremon ordered it to destroy the Republic Diplomatic Corps Consular-class space cruiser Radiant VII, which the droid carried out with accuracy.

OWO-3 was first mentioned, albeit unidentified, in the Databank entry for Antidar Williams on StarWars.com, which was developed by Hyperspace member Ian Tapley. The droid was first identified in The Devious Neimoidians Revealed, a 2014 article published in Star Wars Insider 147.
